DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year < 80 year diagnosis end stage renal disease currently undergoing outpatient hemodialysis ( HD ) one Johns Hopkins Universityaffiliated HD unit Age < 18or > 80years History nonadherence prescribe HD treatment Active drug heavy alcohol use ( define > 4 drinks/day ) Pregnancy breast feed Active infection ( bacterial viral ) clinically significant infection within past three month ( e.g . require hospitalization , judge PI ) Active malignancy ( exception excise nonmetastatic basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma skin , adequately treat pre invasive cervical cancer situ ) Unstable cardiovascular status ( angina , arrhythmias , congestive heart failure etc ... ) History liver disease ( defined diagnosis uncompensated cirrhosis ) â€¢ History lung disease ( include moderatesevere chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , interstitial lung disease , asthma ) Known hypersensitivity yeastderived product Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL hematocrit < 30 % . Abnormal white blood cell ( WBC ) count baseline ( < 3 > 12 x 10 cells/mm ) Treatment WBC growth factor ( GCSF GMCSF ) immunosuppressive medication ( tacrolimus , cyclosporine , mycophenolate , azathioprine , corticosteroid , chlorambucil , cyclophosphamide ) within 4 week study ( erythropoiesisstimulating agent allow ) Treatment lithium within 4 week study
